description: Sample Global ID associated with the parent sample
The type of material of which this Sample is comprised
The age at which this biospecimen was collected. Could be expressed with a term, an age, or an age range.
The approach used to collect the biospecimen ([LOINC](https://loinc.org))
The location of the specimen collection
Can this Sample be requested for further analysis?
enumerations: available=Specimen is currently available;unavailable=Specimen is currently unavailable

description: How is the Sample stored, eg, Frozen or with additives (e.g. https://terminology.hl7.org/5.3.0/ValueSet-v2-0493.html)
The total quantity of the specimen
